cafe1.name: LA LAGARTIJA
cafe1.description: Mysterious and treachorous... The best choice for the start of your journey! It will procide you a rich delicious flavor.

cafe2.name: EL TIGRE
cafe2.description: Really dark coffe, only for the real gourmets. It has bitter flavor of grapefruits and is mixed with a little bit of peanuts with caramel.

cafe3.name: EL TIGRE
cafe3.description: Sweet and intense with a bif amount of different flavors. Caramel, grapes, strwaberry, you name it! It's great choice for warm summer days.
